type.description:
eggolib:permission_level
Checks if the entity has the specified permission level.
Caution: This may not work properly in singleplayer.
Entity Condition Types operate on an Entity, which also allows access to the world. These are available to be used in most powers in the condition object field (or entity_condition in other power/condition types), which restricts when a power is active.
type.markdownDescription:
### `eggolib:permission_level`
Checks if the entity has the specified permission level.
### Caution
This may not work properly in singleplayer.
## Entity Condition Type
Entity Condition Types operate on an Entity, which also allows access to the world. These are available to be used in most powers in the condition object field (or entity_condition in other power/condition types), which restricts when a power is active.

[Entity Condition Types Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_Condition_types/)

comparison.description: Determines how the permission level of the entity should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value which the permission level of the entity should be compared to.
